description: Iyo umwana arwaye cyangwa akirutse agomba kunywa cyane, konka cyane, agahabwa n’indyo yuzuye kandi ihagije kugira ngo agarure imbaraga yataye igihe yari arwaye.
title: Iyo umwana arwaye cyangwa akirutse agomba kunywa cyane, konka cyane, agahabwa n’indyo yuzuye kandi ihagije kugira ngo agarure imbaraga yataye igihe yari arwaye.
content: Iyo umwana arwaye cyangwa akirutse agomba kunywa cyane, konka cyane, agahabwa n’indyo yuzuye kandi ihagije kugira ngo agarure imbaraga yataye igihe yari arwaye.
